value.name: MISSING: Police search for 44-year-old Newport News man
value.description: NEWPORT NEWS, Va. — Police are working to find a 44-year-old man who's been missing for nearly a week. Michael Ray Rodriguez was last seen on May 8, according to Virginia State Police.
